import java.util.Scanner;
import java.util.Arrays;

class ThreeElements
{
	public static void main(String args[])
	{
		Scanner in=new Scanner(System.in);
		int t=in.nextInt();
		for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
		{
			int n=in.nextInt();
			int[] a=new int[n];
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
			{
				a[j]=in.nextInt();
			}
			Arrays.sort(a);
			System.out.println("Case "+(i+1)+": "+(a[n-1]+a[n-2]+a[n-3]));
		}
	}
}
